detail.head: Intern | Institute of System Studies and Analysis, Defence Research and Development Organisation (D.R.D.O)
detail.article: Made a Mission Simulator Editor that can generate a Drools file from data entered by the user in the Editor. The Drool file generated is used to run a simulator to see the efficiency of the Mission planned.

detail.head: Parameter Estimation of Software Relibability Growth Models Using Krill Herd Algorithm.
detail.article: The proposed approach put forward an effective estimation of the parameters for software reliability growth models with the help of Krill Herd Algorithm. The Software Reliability Growth model is considered to be incomplete, if the parameters of model are not known and are not validated over failure datasets. Many techniques are present for estimating parameters of model based on numerical estimation, but the scope of quality enhancement still remain open. The proposed Krill Herd Algorithm based approach outclasses the problems of numerical estimation. The proposed work is validated over four real-time datasets. Check it here.

detail.head: APP-A-THON event at India Smart Grid Week 2017
detail.article: Won Consolation price for making an android application based on Machine learning algorithms to detect electricity theft and water wastage.

detail.head: APP-ATHON event at India Smart Grid Week Competitions 2016
